roleset.name: communication over distance
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on internet examples. No corresponding VNcls. Comparison to 'communicate-v.01'.

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: The reports even claimed that both Khuntia and Swain have admitted their telecommunication with BJD MP Mahatab.

example.name: arg1
example.text: In a method for performing telecommunication of data through a telecommunication network,
example.note: (the MNR phrase at the end should modify 'performing', not 'telecommunication', therefore it should not show up in the span)
